text: In the beginning the Son was Eloah. The Son of El was both with El, and the Son of El was Eloah.
This one was in the beginning with El.
All things were made by him (Yahushua); and without him (Yahushua) nothing was made, *of that* which was made.
For he (Yahushua) is life - this life is the lamp of men.
And the lamp does shine in *the* gloom; but *the* gloom and darkness do not have power over it.
El sent a certain man - his name was Yochanan.
